1370: Ermegardis was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Hubrecht at age 27 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Alem in 1371 at age 28.
1372: Gave birth to Tielen in 1372 at age 29.
1374: Gave birth to Franco in 1374 at age 31.
1375: Gave birth to Cofte in 1375 at age 32.
1376: Lost son Alem when Alem was 6 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Anthonius in 1378 at age 35.
1382: Gave birth to Reynildis in 1382 at age 39.
Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 8 years old.
1383: Lost son Tielen when Tielen was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
